name: Wood Torch
description:
The Wood Torch is an upgraded handheldLight Sourcethat will last longer than theWood Rag Torch. Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar and provides heat when lit.
The Wood Torch will last about 50 minutes when lit before extinguishing. The Wood Torch allows prospectors to see approximately 6 meters, or 3 standard floor pieces, from their position.
